parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Innes appears to have broken out in civil unrest. It's not safe here. \|\|\^
Halt! Under the laws that govern the Kingdom of Innes, you must state your - \|\|\^
We… just came to see what was going on. \|\|\^
That is not a good enough reason he must be a sympathizer. Men gather round. \|\|\^

Cedric, I want you to go to Luthania! \|\|\^
No! I'll stay and help you out! \|\|\^
Cedric, I'm not asking, I’m telling you to go to Luthania. At least one of - \|\|\^
- of us should go to see Idelle and attend her celebration. I can look after - \|\|\^
- myself I will stay and look after Innes please just go. I'll meet you - \|\|\^
Fine! I'll go however I am not happy about this. \|\|\^
I'll make it up to you I promise. \|\|\^

Hi there I’m Cedric and I am trying to help resolve the problem in Innes. \|\|\^
You are? Hah you're just a boy. An entire kingdom couldn't stop the fall of - \|\|\^
- Odaria and you think you can resolve a civil war. You're a funny one, - \|\|\^
Well it will take time, but I am sure it can be achieved. I just need to know - \|\|\^
- what it is that you the workers want? \|\|\^
Well we want a new ruler to guide us. Our current king is a terrible one. - \|\|\^
- We want a fairer representation at the table. Up until now our opinion - \|\|\^
- didnt matter it would always be voted down by the Royals and the Aristocracy - \|\|\^
- We make up the majority and so deserve to be heard and have more rights. \|\|\^
Well that is quite a terrible thing that has happened. We will do our best - \|\|\^
I don't know if we can trust you, but still do your best. \|\|\^
I guess I should go find the Aristocracy now. \|\|\^
